name: UpdateBlogTags
description:
Update multiple blog tags in HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to update blog tag objects identified in the request body within the HubSpot CMS. It is useful for bulk modifications of blog tags.

parameters.name: blog_tags_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON array representing the updated Blog Tags. Include all necessary fields for each tag.

value_schema.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Tags.

parameters.name: update_deleted_blog_tags
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted blog tags. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Tags. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Tags.

value_schema.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Tags.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
